duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform grooming services, including brushing, nail trimming, ear cleaning, and bathing/drying.
Assist Groomers in providing grooming services, interacting with pet parents, and scheduling grooming appointments.
Learn and follow Petco's grooming policies, standards, and guidelines to ensure quality and consistency.
Maintain a clean and organized grooming area, including disinfecting & sanitizing grooming tools and equipment.
Handle and restrain pets of various sizes and temperaments with care and compassion.
